name: Facturozor for WooCommerce
author: Facturozor

sections.description:
Facturozor for WooCommerce will synchronize the customer, articles, orders from woocommerece to facturozor.app.

contact at dev@facturozor.in
sections.faq:
How to get key?

Login to facturozor.app and go to API section and register your wordpress url to get key

How to add key?

In menu select Facturozor Settings and then add the key in API Secret. Then hit Authorize button.

Where to contact

Please write a mail to dev@facturozor.in.
